name: Gerry Ashmore
introduction: Joseph Frederick Harold Gerald Ashmore, known simply as Gerry Ashmore, is a British former Formula 1 driver, who competed between in 1961 and 1962. He mostly competed in a privately owned Lotus, a type 18 in 1961, and a type 18/21 in 1962. He was also entered by the works BRM team for one race, but he did not participate.
